EmailTemplate.name: Vouch - Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: {!npe4__Relationship__c.npe4__RelatedContact__c} has invited you to join IAVA!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!npe4__Relationship__c.First_Name_of_Primary_Contact__c},
{!npe4__Relationship__c.npe4__RelatedContact__c} is inviting you to become a member of Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America by verifying that you served in Iraq or Afghanistan. Membership is completely free!
As part of IAVA, youâ€™re a part something great and empowering - our movement is growing, and we are honored to have you a part of it! But the first step is for you to accept the invitation and join myIAVA!
{!if(isblank(npe4__Relationship__c.Peer_Invite_Message__c),"", "Here is a message from "+npe4__Relationship__c.npe4__RelatedContact__c+": " + npe4__Relationship__c.Peer_Invite_Message__c)}
As a member of IAVA of you have the opportunity to:
Log in to myIAVA to host and attend VetTogethers! Be sure to check your e-mail soon for your temporary password.
What is a VetTogether you ask? They are monthly gatherings of veterans, family members and supporters across the nation, which provide a number of fun and unique ways to unite together. Check out www.vettogethers.org.
Stay connected with us on social media! Check us out on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
Want to rock your own IAVA gear? Access the store HERE!
If you have any login issues or join questions please contact us at myiava@iava.org.
Thank you for your continued support of IAVA and welcome to the family!
Sincerely,
Paul Rieckhoff Iraq Veteran Executive Director & Founder Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
